snippet: JetBlue Airways is taking applications for 24 slots in a new program to train novice pilots to fly passenger jets.
abstract: JetBlue is accepting applicants for new program that will train novice pilots to fly passenger jets; four-year program will cost roughly $125,000.
lead_paragraph: JetBlue Airways is taking applications for 24 slots in a new program to train novice pilots to fly passenger jets.

headline.main: JetBlue Is Seeking Applications to Train New Pilots to Fly Jets
headline.print_headline: JetBlue Is Seeking Applications to Train New Pilots to Fly Jets
